Premium residential apartment for sale  ashoka enclave part 1, sector 35, faridabad
Presenting an elegant **ready-To-Move residential apartment** in the prestigious ashoka enclave 1, faridabad**. 
Designed for refined urban living, this thoughtfully planned residence offers a **built-Up area of 1650sq. Ft.** with a **carpet area of 1493sq. Ft.**, positioned on the *ground floor** of a contemporary residential building. 
The apartment is **tastefully semi-Furnished**, featuring a **modular kitchen, premium wardrobes, cupboards, gas pipeline, stove, water purifier, fans, designer lighting, and geysers**. Spacious living areas, **well-Appointed bathrooms, multiple balconies**, and excellent natural light create an atmosphere of comfort and sophistication. A **servant room** and **covered parking** further enhance convenience.

Set within a **secure gated community**, residents enjoy world-Class amenities including **power backup, high-Speed lifts, landscaped gardens, sports facilities, childrens play area, cctv surveillance, clubhouse, and community hall**, along with uninterrupted water supply.
